remarks: The predicate "is a lattice line".  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2012.)
statement:
llnset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
llnset.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
llnset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
llnset.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
islln $p |- ( K e. D -> ( X e. N <-> ( X e. B /\ E. p e. A p C X ) ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d K p $.
$d X p $.
